result.markdown: --- title: "Index" --- Welcome to the [effective data visualisation with R]{style="color:#006DAE;"} workshop! Tuesday 6th December 2022 9.00AM - 12.00PM AEDT Zoom (links provided to participants via email) ## Materials All materials are hosted on a GitHub repo [here](https://github.com/emitanaka/EDVR-workshop) and can be downloaded [here as a zip file](https://github.com/emitanaka/EDVR-workshop/archive/refs/heads/master.zip) (including the website, slides and exercises). Once the material is downloaded, open the `docs/index.html` in a browser to see this website ([emitanaka.org/EDVR-workshop](https://emitanaka.org/EDVR-workshop/)). ## Schedule ## Installation This is only needed if the exercise links above do not work for you. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} install.packages(c("remotes", "learnr")) remotes::install_github("emitanaka/EDVR-workshop/pkg") ``` ::: ## Exercises To run the exercises locally, install the packages under [Installation](#installation) and then run: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} learnr::run_tutorial("exercise-01", package = "edvr.workshop") learnr::run_tutorial("exercise-02", package = "edvr.workshop") ``` ::: ## Lorum Ipsum Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.
